question: Write a letter to an accommodation agency for change in your accommodations (150words)- explain your past requirements - why do you want to change your current accommodations - what are your requirements for the new accommodations
text: I am joseph, writing this letter to request you to change my current accommodation at Horizon Tower Flat No.5609, because I am suffering here by countless issues related to hygiene also I am varied about my studies.

Earlier, I made it clear to you about things I could not manage within the accommodation. Firstly, neatness is my top priority, late night comers will disturb our sleep and enjoying high-sound music can divert the attention of others. Unfortunately, at present ,accommodations people did not maintain discipline as well as hygiene. So I cannot tolerate such activities.

So kindly take the necessary steps to change my accommodation as soon as possible, because the next semester is near.  I have to do the preparation.  It is my humble request to you to provide accommodation where others students are hygienic, maintain timings and show manners while dealing with roommates.
I hope you understand my situation and that I cannot concentrate on my studies because of the problems I am facing on a daily basis. Changing accommodation can be the only remedy to all the problems.
I am looking for your quick action on these.
